# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.0.17] - 2026-01-20

<!-- generated by git-cliff -->

## [0.0.16] - 2026-01-20

### Bug Fixes

- **clippy**: Resolve type conversion and code quality warnings
- Rename queue crate to rsketch-common-storage-queue
- **release**: Use single workspace tag instead of per-package tags

### Documentation

- **queue**: Add API documentation
- Add features section to README

### Features

- Integrate Buf for multi-language gRPC code generation
- **queue**: Add error types and Result alias
- **queue**: Add configuration types and rolling strategy
- **queue**: Add QueueBuilder with fluent API
- **queue**: Implement DataFile with mmap-io
- **queue**: Add file path management utilities
- **queue**: Add Message and WriteEvent types
- **queue**: Implement CRC64 calculation and verification
- **queue**: Implement Appender with channel-based writing
- **queue**: Implement persistent queue with manifest-based recovery
- **worker**: Add fallible workers and pause modes

### Chore

- Apply clippy lints and fix warnings across workspace
- Make clippy happy
- **deps**: Update criterion requirement from 0.5 to 0.8 ([#118](https://github.com/crrow/rsketch/issues/118))
- Remove opencode workflow and fix criterion import
- Release v0.0.11
- Release v0.0.12
- Release v0.0.13
- Update remade
- Release v0.0.15

<!-- generated by git-cliff -->

## [0.0.15] - 2026-01-20

### Bug Fixes

- **clippy**: Resolve type conversion and code quality warnings
- Rename queue crate to rsketch-common-storage-queue
- **release**: Use single workspace tag instead of per-package tags

### Documentation

- **queue**: Add API documentation

### Features

- Integrate Buf for multi-language gRPC code generation
- **queue**: Add error types and Result alias
- **queue**: Add configuration types and rolling strategy
- **queue**: Add QueueBuilder with fluent API
- **queue**: Implement DataFile with mmap-io
- **queue**: Add file path management utilities
- **queue**: Add Message and WriteEvent types
- **queue**: Implement CRC64 calculation and verification
- **queue**: Implement Appender with channel-based writing
- **queue**: Implement persistent queue with manifest-based recovery
- **worker**: Add fallible workers and pause modes

### Miscellaneous Tasks

- Apply clippy lints and fix warnings across workspace
- Make clippy happy
- Remove opencode workflow and fix criterion import
- Release v0.0.11
- Release v0.0.12
- Release v0.0.13
- Update remade

## [0.0.11] - 2026-01-20

### Bug Fixes

- **clippy**: Resolve type conversion and code quality warnings

### Documentation

- **queue**: Add API documentation

### Features

- Integrate Buf for multi-language gRPC code generation
- **queue**: Add error types and Result alias
- **queue**: Add configuration types and rolling strategy
- **queue**: Add QueueBuilder with fluent API
- **queue**: Implement DataFile with mmap-io
- **queue**: Add file path management utilities
- **queue**: Add Message and WriteEvent types
- **queue**: Implement CRC64 calculation and verification
- **queue**: Implement Appender with channel-based writing
- **queue**: Implement persistent queue with manifest-based recovery
- **worker**: Add fallible workers and pause modes

### Miscellaneous Tasks

- Make clippy happy
- Remove opencode workflow and fix criterion import
